summary: A lightweight container that stores a DeepSpeed configuration dictionary and provides fast queries for specific settings such as the ZeRO optimization stage. It registers a weak reference in the moduleâ€™s globals so that the configuration can be accessed from parts of the codebase that do not have a Trainer instance, and it is designed to stay alive for the duration of the program.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless access to DeepSpeed parameters across the Hugging Face training pipeline, allowing components like model loading and embedding resizing to retrieve configuration details without needing a full Trainer object, thereby simplifying integration and reducing coupling.
